Authors:
Luis A Parra, Claudio Angelini, Beatriz Ortiz-Santana, G
Mata, C Billette, C Rojo, Jie Chen, Philippe Callac
Title:
The genus Agaricus in the Caribbean. Nine new taxa mostly
based on collections from the Dominican Republic
Abstract:
11 taxa of the genus Agaricus belonging to 6 sections from
basidiomata mostly collected in the Dominican Republic in the period
2009-2016 are described and iconographied. Three sections and six
species are here proposed as new for science: Agaricus sect. Kerrigania,
Agaricus sect. Minoriopsis, Agaricus sect. Pantropicales, A.
argenteopurpureus, A. flavidodiscus, A. lodgeae, A. candussoi, A.
porphyropos and A. tephrolepidus. A study of their phylogenetic
relationships with other Agaricus taxa are also provided
